deprecationInformation.title: Schools financial benchmarking will no longer be updated with new data
deprecationInformation.body:
Find the latest data on the new [Financial Benchmarking and Insights Tool](https://financial-benchmarking-and-insights-tool.education.gov.uk/).
This will include 2023-24 data for maintained schools.

This service will include all previous financial data available too.
deprecationInformation.oldServiceLinkText: Continue to schools financial benchmarking (legacy service)
